properties.query:
// Author: Michael Gibbs
// Description: Azure AD Enumeration scripts ran to discover users and group permissions.
// False Positives: N/A
let signInLookup = (
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(1d)
| where DeviceDetail contains "displayName"
| extend DeviceDetailJson = parse_json(DeviceDetail)
| extend DeviceNameSI = tostring(DeviceDetailJson.displayName)
| distinct DeviceNameSI, UserPrincipalName, UserDisplayName
);
let Module = dynamic([@"Get-AADIntAzureTenants",
@"Invoke-AADIntReconAsInsider",
@"Get-AADIntCache",
@"Get-AADIntAccessTokenForAADGraph",
@"Get-AADIntAccessToken",
@"Invoke-AADIntUserEnumerationAsOutsider",
@"Invoke-AADIntReconAsGuest",
@"Get-AADIntAccessTokenForAzureCoreManagement",
@"Call-AzureAADIAMAPI",
@"Invoke-AADIntUserEnumerationAsInsider",
@"Invoke-AADIntUserEnumerationAsGuest",
@"Connect-AADUser",
@"Get-AzureGraphToken",
@"Invoke-AzureHound",
@"Get-AzRoleAssignment",
@"Get-AzureServicePrincipal",
@"Select-AzSubscription",
@"Get-Azroleassignment",
@"Get-MsolRoleMember"
]);
DeviceEvents
| where AdditionalFields has_any (Module)
| extend SILogDeviceName = toupper((split(DeviceName, "."))[0])
    | join kind=leftouter signInLookup on $left.SILogDeviceName == $right.DeviceNameSI
    | project DeviceName, InitiatingProcessAccountDomain, InitiatingProcessAccountName, UserDisplayName, Module
properties.description:
Adversaries may attempt to get a listing of cloud accounts. Cloud accounts are those created and configured by an organization for use by users, remote support, services, or for administration of resources within a cloud service provider or SaaS application. Adversaries can use enumeration in order to build out a list of valid users and connect as an external user.
PLATFORM:Microsoft 365,Azure AD,IaaS
MITRE:TA0007;T1087;T1087.004
